body:
@SprKamiDende

https://discord.gg/mnpC76KuGG  <-Heres a new discord link. Didn't realize it expired after 7days unless you set it to never.

also you'd have an easier time finding me by googling Atelier Sol Aer.   Xenxia is just my actual Pen name while Atelier Sol Aer is the group name.

https://twitter.com/AtelierSolAer  <- twitter exists but you'd have a better chance commissioning something or talking to me on discord. which is why i send discord links.
@ViXenxia I tried googling you and could only find pirated sources. Discord invite is also expired. I kinda don't like following Discord links anyway, but I don't see an easy way to follow you.
9592087 Want to see me licking my girlfriend's pussy on webcam, go to >>> litelink.at/n_hent <<<
@ViXenxia Nice I guess

@ViXenxia Nah i think thats gonna take a while i have quite the good head of long hair. its however going gray, but that started years ago when i was still an adolescence. won't be balding if at all for a while though, im not even middle aged yet.
@ViXenxia Are you balding yet?

@HentaiLover247 First of all, Rude. Second of all, which site. Third of all yes yes. everyone has pirated atleast once in their life. The only real thing is if you go and actually buy the thing you pirated for real later, which i mostly do. and i haven't even pirated in years anyway. Also if i was truely being Hypocritical i'd have reported this to be taken down, as you see my main argument was that the least someone could do that pirates my work is to atleast leave a link to me so i can get more people coming to me, not once did i say take this down. Not once was the issue about that its been pirated at all, i suspected it to happen and its like i can't blame people for it. What i blame them for is not having the consideration to atleast point people my way, thats my strife with this. BOTH of the uploads of this comic doesn't remotely have an artist name or someone leaving a comment link to my page, thats the problem.

@ViXenxia Get rolled cripple. lol

Best I can do is follow your pixiv, i'm not gonna pay for pixels. Also you have a 4 y/o account on a pirate website soooo. Kinda hypocritical to say some artists need paywalls to live(like you) while looking at pirated works and kinda supporting the site by having an account and commenting.
Hey lemme borrow your onahole too

@bigbitxh 

I have a chronic illness that causes constant and enhanced pain and fatigue so i do not have the stamina most of the time to be able to work consistently since i need to take pain medication and rest alot to not pull my hair out from constant pain. 

if you wanna look up the condition specifically its Fibromyalgia

I've no reason to actually lie about it though, i'd make more money if i could work, pretty sure working at MCdonalds gets you more stable pay than being a freelance commission artist who can't draw as fast as need be.

Also i don't request to take it down because someone will just most likely upload it again and pirates happen all the time, i just rather people who wish to support me come do so anyway even if you can read it here for free.
How are you disable? (Genuine question) Most people on the internet can say they're disable and not be, and can't you just request the site to take it down ViXenxia
Paywall idiots get pwnd
Not bad. They really need to put credit for the author
I want to be a fleshlight and be used by a futanari gamer girl, but only in my dreams... Good shit.
This was so hot. I want to be that guy
this is amazing we need more please and I wish i was him

Is it that hard to actually atleast put the artist tag or something?

You just upload my work and just not even send people my way.

thanks alot..........

Heres my discord link if ya'll are willing to actually buy the comic.

https://discord.gg/aTtp2CpZ
The artist is gonna be pissed, she keeps this comic under a pay wall so don't expect her to stay silent if she finds it here
Welcome to the cultured club.
i love how i no longer question shit, seen too much shit
